Package com.hedera.sdk.transaction

    Class to handle transactions on Hedera Hashgraph

      • getReceipt

        public boolean getReceipt​(HederaTransactionID transactionID)
                   throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Gets a receipt for a transaction Get the receipt of a transaction, given its transaction ID. Once a transaction reaches consensus, then information about whether it succeeded or failed will be available until the end of the receipt period. Before and after the receipt period, and for a transaction that was never submitted, the receipt is unknown. This query is free (the payment field is left empty).
        Parameters:
        transactionID - the transactionID the receipt is requested for
        Returns:
        true if successful
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - in the event of a node communication issue

      • getRecord

        public boolean getRecord​(HederaTransaction payment,
                         HederaTransactionID transactionID,
                         HederaQueryHeader.QueryResponseType responseType)
                  throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Get the record for a transaction. If the transaction requested a record, then the record lasts for one hour, and a state proof is available for it. If the transaction created an account, file, or smart contract instance, then the record will contain the ID for what it created. If the transaction called a smart contract function, then the record contains the result of that call. If the transaction was a cryptocurrency transfer, then the record includes the TransferList which gives the details of that transfer. If the transaction didn't return anything that should be in the record, then the results field will be set to nothing.
        Parameters:
        payment - the HederaTransaction payment for requesting the record
        transactionID - the HederaTransactionID for which the record is requested
        responseType - the type of response required
        Returns:
        true if successful
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - in the event of a node communication error

      • getRecordAnswerOnly

        public boolean getRecordAnswerOnly​(HederaTransaction payment,
                                   HederaTransactionID transactionID)
                            throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Get the record for a transaction without a state proof If the transaction requested a record, then the record lasts for one hour, and a state proof is available for it. If the transaction created an account, file, or smart contract instance, then the record will contain the ID for what it created. If the transaction called a smart contract function, then the record contains the result of that call. If the transaction was a cryptocurrency transfer, then the record includes the TransferList which gives the details of that transfer. If the transaction didn't return anything that should be in the record, then the results field will be set to nothing.
        Parameters:
        payment - the HederaTransaction payment for requesting the record
        transactionID - the HederaTransactionID for which the record is requested
        Returns:
        true if successful
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - in the event of a node communication error

      • getRecordStateProof

        public boolean getRecordStateProof​(HederaTransaction payment,
                                   HederaTransactionID transactionID)
                            throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Get the record for a transaction with a state proof If the transaction requested a record, then the record lasts for one hour, and a state proof is available for it. If the transaction created an account, file, or smart contract instance, then the record will contain the ID for what it created. If the transaction called a smart contract function, then the record contains the result of that call. If the transaction was a cryptocurrency transfer, then the record includes the TransferList which gives the details of that transfer. If the transaction didn't return anything that should be in the record, then the results field will be set to nothing.
        Parameters:
        payment - the HederaTransaction payment for requesting the record
        transactionID - the HederaTransactionID for which the record is requested
        Returns:
        true if successful
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - in the event of a node communication error

      • getRecordCostAnswer

        public boolean getRecordCostAnswer​(HederaTransactionID transactionID)
                            throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Get cost of obtaining a record for a transaction without a state proof If the transaction requested a record, then the record lasts for one hour, and a state proof is available for it. If the transaction created an account, file, or smart contract instance, then the record will contain the ID for what it created. If the transaction called a smart contract function, then the record contains the result of that call. If the transaction was a cryptocurrency transfer, then the record includes the TransferList which gives the details of that transfer. If the transaction didn't return anything that should be in the record, then the results field will be set to nothing.
        Parameters:
        transactionID - the HederaTransactionID for which the record is requested
        Returns:
        true if successful
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - in the event of a node communication error

      • getRecordCostAnswerStateProof

        public boolean getRecordCostAnswerStateProof​(HederaTransactionID transactionID)
                                      throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Get cost of obtaining a record for a transaction with a state proof If the transaction requested a record, then the record lasts for one hour, and a state proof is available for it. If the transaction created an account, file, or smart contract instance, then the record will contain the ID for what it created. If the transaction called a smart contract function, then the record contains the result of that call. If the transaction was a cryptocurrency transfer, then the record includes the TransferList which gives the details of that transfer. If the transaction didn't return anything that should be in the record, then the results field will be set to nothing.
        Parameters:
        transactionID - the HederaTransactionID for which the record is requested
        Returns:
        true if successful
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - in the event of a node communication error
